name: RaspberryPiNews

skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill

des: Note: I am not associated with the Raspberry Pi Foundation in any way. I created this project to let me and other people keep up with the Raspberry Pi blog more easily.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
